Change Password Dialog Box (Domain Account Manager)

Requires: Base Development System (Windows)

Click the Change Password button on the General tab of the User Properties dialog box to display this dialog box.

Use this dialog box to change the password for the specified user.

This dialog box includes the following components:

  • User name—Displays the name of the user whose password you want to change.
  • New password—Specifies the new password for the current user.
  • Re-type new password—Reenter the password you entered in the New password text box to confirm the new password for the current user.
